title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2408.16 - Educational fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2408.16 - Educational fees

State Regulations

For purposes of student aid, educational fees shall include
library fees, registration fees, laboratory fees and diploma fees. Fees charged
for purposes involving primarily the pleasure, comfort or penalty of the
student shall be considered noneducational. Such fees include athletic fees, student publication fees, health fees and insurance, student activities fees, maintenance costs, cost of books or uniforms, late registration fees, laboratory breakage fees, and graduation assessment costs other than diploma
fees. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
2408.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
